title: shasan
author: shasan
created_time: July 17, 2022, 05:07:50 AMLast edit: August 02, 2022, 11:43:57 AM by shasan
content: S H I T C O I N    B O U N T YBounty for the First Parody Token on the First Parody Blockchain!       This is a bounty for SHITCOIN, a Dogeparty token created on the Dogecoin blockchain in August 2014. All bounties will be paid in Shitcoin, so you must download and install the Dogewallet to participate (click here for a step-by-step guide).The purpose of this bounty is to spread knowledge of Shitcoin, Dogeparty, and Dogermint tokens in specific. It also serves to raise awareness of the Historical NFT movement that started last year.There will be three parts to this bounty:I. Signature campaign - 40%II. Twitter campaign - 35%III. YouTube / Blog campaign - 25%1,200 stakes total for distribution = maximum 1.2 million SHITCOINs (4 weeks) (minimum of 200 and maximum 1000 SHITCOINs per stake)Stakes will be paid out to participants' Dogewallet address, at the end of the 4 week period.Week I - Jul 17-23Week II - Jul 24-30Week III - Jul 31-Aug 6Week IV - Aug 7-13This bounty will go for at least 4 weeks. If it encounters any success, it will be extended on a weekly basis; tokens distributed at the end of each additional week.We will also award weekly prizes in the form of DOGE or Dogeparty tokens (NFTs) to top contributors of our choosing.We expect the utmost professionality from all of our bounty participants, meaning we want to be represented by competent posters and high-quality accounts. We reserve the right to remove campaign members who do not meet our expectations at our discretion and you may or may not be compensated for your work if you are removed. You must not have negative trust to participate, and please do not enroll multiple accounts into this campaign. Thank you.SIGNATURE CAMPAIGNYou must be of Full Member rank or above and make at least 10 posts per week. Only posts in sections that display signatures will be counted (not including posts in Off-Topic, spam megathreads, or bounty/signature campaign threads). Posts must be at least 200 characters in length (~40 words or 3-5 sentences).Full Member: 3 stakes/week (10 spots)Code:[center][font=Arial Black][url=https://dogermint.com/shitcoin/]💩  💩  💩  💩 black][size=24pt][glow=#5c3629,2][color=transparent][size=8pt].[/size].[size=9pt][sup][size=16pt][color=#fff]BUY NOW[/size][/sup][/size].[size=8pt].[/td][/tr][/table][/center]TWITTER CAMPAIGNWe are not accepting new participant on Twitter campaign.To join the Twitter campaign you must follow the Shitcoin twitter account and re-tweet our tweets. You must also make at least 2 tweets a week about Shitcoin and/or Dogermint. It is appreciated if you follow the Dogermint twitter account but not mandatory for participation (it may help give you ideas for tweets).Over 500 followers: 2 stakes / week (10 spots)Over 1000 followers: 4 stakes / week (10 spots)Over 2000 followers: 8 stakes / week (5 spots)Please post updates in the following format for each week you are part of this campaign:Code:Week # :Twitter Profile LinkFollowers:Spreadsheet #:[b]Retweet[/b]1.2.3.4.5.[b]Tweet [/b]1.2.Post in this thread using the following format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Twitter profile link:Twitter audit link:Twitter follower:Dogewallet Address:Also Please fill this form as well. https://forms.gle/RAx1ajT7WfgiCTpU8 No Longer accepting new participant for twitter campaign.YOUTUBE / BLOG CAMPAIGN CLOSEDYouTube Campaign: 10-20 stakesWe are not accepting new participant on YouTube CampaignContent will be judged by the following criteria: quality, views and effects.Your video must be at least 3 minutes; shorter videos are not accepted.Your channel must be at least 2 months oldYour channel should have at least 100 subscribers.You should make the video in English.You will receive a reward at the end of the campaign, depending on the quality and popularity of your work.Your video must be original. Copying graphics, text and other content is not allowed. (You can still use the project's images, logos, ANN-topic, Twitter and Facebook material)To prove the authorship of your video, this ANN Thread link must be added in the video description, along with your Bitcointalk username.Blog Campaign: 5-15 stakesWe are not accepting new participant on Blog CampaignThe Shitcoin team requires well thought-out and original articles which provide a comprehensive overview of the Shitcoin project.Blog articles may be published anywhere, on the internet and publicly accessible. We prefer if they are published on your own website but will also accept publications on Medium, Blogger, Steam, Reddit, Hackernoon, LinkedIn, or WordPressWriters should familiarize themselves with the project to ensure an accurate depiction of what Shitcoin is all about.To qualify for this blog bounty, each article must:1. Include the following mentions or hashtags: Shitcoin or Shitcoin 3.0, Dogermint, Dogeparty, Dogecoin.2. Be 500+ words or longer.3. Contain links to the Shitcoin ANN and Shitcoin page on the Dogermint website. The links must be hyperlinked within the post itself and not at the end of the post.4. Have unique, original content (no plagiarism and spins of ANN or Dogermint text will not count).5. Remain active and live for a minimum of 30 days.The blog bounty reward will be evaluated based on article length and quality of publication and content. Each bounty hunter can write and publish up to 2 articles and blogs for this campaign.TO JOIN THE BOUNTYPost in this thread using the following format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Campaign(s) of Participation:Dogewallet Address:If you have questions, feel free to PM the Bounty Manager (shasan) or join our Telegram group.CLICK HERE TO VIEW THE SPREADSHEET
